item.description:
Some Communist lobsters have been spotted off shore of Plymouth MA. Their stealthy approach and red colour clearly show their intent to overthrow Capitalism. We are gathering to defeat this red invasion by mercilessly devouring the enemy.
++++
Additional Itinerary for LobsterFest 2010 in Plymouth (with Pre- & Post-Wine Tasting Events)

Rain or Shine

Noon: Arrive at Plymouth Colony Winery to do some wine tasting.
http://www.plymouthco...

1:00PM: Drive to Lobster Hut to park and head out for a walk of downtown Plymouth. (Those wishing to join us for the walk should meet us outside of the Lobster Hut.)

The Main Event: 2:00PM: Meet outside Lobster Hut at 25 Town Wharf, Plymouth, MA 02360 for LobsterFest 2010

3:45PM: Walk across the street to the Plymouth Winery for more wine tasting.
http://www.plymouthwi...

Time and weather permitting, there may be a "hike" on the breakwater. (If this interests you, be sure to have appropriate footwear for mostly walking -- and some climbing over rocks.)

For Questions and Contact Info, please contact Mark Shar off list.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Free State Project Tshirt

group.name: The Boston Ayn Rand Meetup Group

item.name: LobsterFest Plymouth
